Upon encountering Dark Rodimus, Straight Shot's reaction was one of devious=
ness instead of fear.  She looks around quickly and realizes the terrain wa=
s full of trees that may be damaged but were still stable enough to hold he=
r weight.  She jumps up to catch a hanging branch and like a skilled acroba=
t, she manages to swing herself up higher into the trees.  From there, she =
could see a large branch severely cracked, hanging right over Dark Rodimus'=
s head.     She then spots a large tree root at the edge of what looked lik=
e a tar pool.  How convenient was that?  And she certainly was fast enough =
to dart out of the way if she had to.  But if she could only break that bra=
nch without falling out of the tree herself.  

" Hmmm...  He's right, we t=
ypically are kinda predictable..  So why not try something original?  Now h=
ow deep is that crack?"

She examines the crack in the branch.  She finds t=
hat with just a strong hit with a sharp object, the branch would definitely=
 come down. She raises a brow, aims her arm launcher and fires at the crack=
 in the branch.  She hits her target as the branch cracks loudly and detach=
es from the damaged tree with a loud creaking noise.  She hoped her first p=
lan of attack would work.  Phase two would also prove difficult as she wait=
s to see how the chips fall, literally. 

" Timber.."

Meanwhile, Tucson qu=
ickly catches Noctorro as he puts his body beneath his to support him.

" E=
asy I got you.  Seekers?  But how? They're out scouting the parameters, I s=
aw them myself.  Something is very wrong here. Leo Prime, it's definitely n=
ot Hydras and I'm almost certain a greater evil is at play here.  I suggest=
 we send rescue efforts to the Fuzors immediately. And I don't think it's a=
 matter of who, it's a matter of what is causing such chaos."

He looks to =
Hydras.

You haven't deployed any seekers have you?  If you gave that order=
 to attack the Fuzors our alliance ends here."

He scowls at Hydras.

Meanw=
hile Nightshift watches from a good distance as Straight Shot attempts to p=
lay decoy with Dark Rodimus.  Yet seeing him seems extremely disturbing to =
Nightshift.  He rolls into view and looks to the dark imposter.

" So that'=
s it, huh?!  First you make us believe you're all over the evil thing and n=
ow you go right back ta be'n an A class Aft.  Nice, real nice.  Elita hate =
ta say it but I think your dad just turned tail on us.  That's it, I take o=
rders from Leo and Tucson but that's about it.  Consider yourself on my do =
not trust list.  Peace out." 

He turns around to drive Elita to safety.

"=
 FROM HERE ON OUT, I ONLY TAKE ORDERS FROM REAL PRIMES, NOT OVER RATED HOT =
ROD WANNA BE AFTS LIKE YOU!"

He secures Elita on his drivers side seats.

=
" Sorry Elita but your dad really is act'n like a real aft right now".

  
=



Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.
